content.name: exists1
content.prop: (exists1 P) ⟷ (∃x. P x ∧ (∀y. P y ⟶ y = x))

content.name: exE
content.prop: (∃a. P a) ⟶ (∀a. P a ⟶ C) ⟶ C

content.name: extension
content.prop: (∀x. f x = g x) ⟶ f = g

content.name: if_P
content.prop: P ⟶ (if P then x else y) = x

content.name: if_not_P
content.prop: ¬P ⟶ (if P then x else y) = y

content.name: the_equality
content.prop: P a ⟶ (∀x. P x ⟶ x = a) ⟶ (THE x. P x) = a

proof.th: A, A ⟶ B, B ⟶ C ⊢ B
A, A ⟶ B, B ⟶ C ⊢ C
A ∨ B, A ⟶ C, B ⟶ C ⊢ C
A ⟶ B, B ⟶ A ⊢ A = B

content.name: theI

proof.th: ∀x. P x ⟶ x = a ⊢ ∀x. P x ⟶ x = a
P a, ∀x. P x ⟶ x = a ⊢ (THE x. P x) = a
P a, ∀x. P x ⟶ x = a ⊢ P (THE x. P x)
⊢ P a ⟶ (∀x. P x ⟶ x = a) ⟶ P (THE x. P x)

content.prop: P a ⟶ (∀x. P x ⟶ x = a) ⟶ P (THE x. P x)

content.name: theI'
content.prop: (∃!x. P x) ⟶ P (THE x. P x)

content.name: if_true

proof.args: if_P, (if true then a else b) = a
proof.th: ⊢ (if true then a else b) = a
⊢ (if true then a else b) = a

content.prop: (if true then a else b) = a

content.name: if_false

proof.args: if_not_P, (if false then a else b) = b
proof.th: ⊢ (if false then a else b) = b
⊢ (if false then a else b) = b

content.prop: (if false then a else b) = b

content.name: if_not_P2

proof.th: P ⊢ ¬P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b

proof.args: negE_gen, {A: P, C: (if ¬P then a else b) = b}
proof.th: ¬P, P ⊢ (if ¬P then a else b) = b
P ⊢ ¬P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b
P ⊢ ¬¬P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b

proof.args: if_not_P, (if ¬P then a else b) = b

proof.th: P ⊢ ¬¬P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b
P ⊢ (if ¬P then a else b) = b
⊢ P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b

content.prop: P ⟶ (if ¬P then a else b) = b

proof.th: A ∨ B, ¬A ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ B ∨ C
A ∨ B, ¬A ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ B ∨ C
A ⟶ B ⟶ C ⊢ A ⟶ B ⟶ C
A ∧ B, A ⟶ B ⟶ C ⊢ B ⟶ C
A ∧ B, A ⟶ B ⟶ C ⊢ C
P x ⟶ R ⊢ P x ⟶ R
∀x1. P x1, P x ⟶ R ⊢ R
